Package org.jfree.chart.title

Classes used to display chart titles and subtitles.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CompositeTitle
    A title that contains multiple titles within a BlockContainer.
    CompositeTitleTest
    Tests for the CompositeTitle class.
    DateTitle
    A chart title that displays the date.
    DateTitleTest
    Tests for the DateTitle class.
    ImageTitle
    A chart title that displays an image.
    ImageTitleTest
    Tests for the ImageTitle class.
    LegendGraphic
    The graphical item within a legend item.
    LegendGraphicTest
    Tests for the LegendGraphic class.
    LegendItemBlockContainer
    A container that holds all the pieces of a single legend item.
    LegendTitle
    A chart title that displays a legend for the data in the chart.
    LegendTitleTest
    Some tests for the LegendTitle class.
    PaintScaleLegend
    A legend that shows a range of values and their associated colors, driven by an underlying PaintScale implementation.
    PaintScaleLegendTest
    Tests for the PaintScaleLegend class.
    ShortTextTitle
    A text title that is only displayed if the entire text will be visible without line wrapping.
    ShortTextTitleTest
    Tests for the ShortTextTitle class.
    TextTitle
    A chart title that displays a text string with automatic wrapping as required.
    TextTitleTest
    Tests for the TextTitle class.
    Title
    The base class for all chart titles.
    TitleTest
    Tests for the abstract Title class.

Package org.jfree.chart.title Description

Classes used to display chart titles and subtitles.
